Dashboard.gamesWillAppearHere: Games will appear here once they are completed
Dashboard.unassignedMatchesDescription: These matches have not been assigned to any court
Dashboard.noCourtsAssignedDescription: No matches have been assigned to courts yet
Dashboard.createNewMatches: Create new matches by clicking the Generate Matches button
Dashboard.generateGroupMatchesDescription: This will generate all matches for all groups in this stage based on the configured match rules.
Dashboard.generateBracketMatchesDescription: This will generate all matches for all brackets in this stage.
Dashboard.generateMatchesWarning: This action will generate matches for the entire stage. If matches already exist, this may create duplicates.
